name: Growblock
description:
Rules

  1. You are the Blue block.
  2. Collect Green blocks. They make you bigger and give +1 point.
  3. Avoid red blocks. They halve your size and points.

Controls

  • Up to move upwards
  • Down to move downwards

Options

  • 1 for easy mode (12 Points).
  • 2 for medium mode (18 Points).
  • 3 for hard mode (21 Points).
  • 4 for insane mode (25 Points).
  • 5 for zen mode. No win condition. How big can you get?
  • B to restart game
  • S to toggle sounds on/off.
  • X for only SFX (Pro tip - 5 + X = ultimate zen mode).
